description: Number of ways to color vertices of a pentagon using <= n colors, allowing rotations and reflections.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b060446.txt", n, " ", (n^5 + 5*n^3 + 4*n)/10); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 05 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 07 2001
